albania.notes: Visa free for a maximum stay of 90 days within 180 days for valid visa holders or residents of the Schengen Area member states, the United Kingdom and the United States.

andorra.notes: Andorra has no visa regime, but is only accessible through France and Spain. Multiple Entry Schengen Visa required.

angola.notes: Pre-arranged visa can be picked up on arrival

antigua_and_barbuda.notes: Visa free for a maximum stay of 30 days for valid visa holders or residents of the Schengen Area member states, the United Kingdom, the United States and Canada.

armenia.notes: Simplified procedure for Iraqi citizens - no requirement for tourist voucher or invitation letter from Armenia.

australia.notes: May apply online (Online Visitor e600 visa).

azerbaijan.notes: Visa on arrival if having official invitation letter issued by the State Migration Service of Azerbaijan.

belize.notes: Permanent residents and holders of multiple entry visa of the United States may obtain a visa on arrival.holder valid visa issued by a Schengen Member State are visa exempt for a maximum stay of 90 days.

benin.notes: Must have an international vaccination certificate.

bhutan.notes: Holders of an application for a tourist visa can obtain a visa on arrival.

bosnia_and_herzegovina.notes: Visa not required for 30 days if holding multiple-entry visa issued by Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Ireland (Rep.), Monaco, Romania, USA, United Kingdom or a Schengen Member State.

bulgaria.notes: Visa free for a maximum stay of 90 days within 180 days for valid visa holders or residents of the Schengen Area member states.

burundi.notes: Pre-arranged visa can be picked up on arrival.

cameroon.notes: Pre-arranged visa can be picked up on arrival.

chad.notes: Pre-arranged visa can be picked up on arrival.

china.notes: Pre-arranged visa can be picked up on arrival.

republic_of_the_congo.notes: Visa not requiered if Passengers with a V.I.P invitation letter.

democratic_republic_of_the_congo.notes: Passenger with a letter (Visa Volant) issued by the Ministry of Interior and Security can obtain a visa on arrival.

costa_rica.notes: Visa free for a maximum stay of 30 days for valid visa holders or residents of the United States and Canada.

croatia.notes: Visa free for a maximum stay of 90 days within 180 days for valid visa holders or residents of the Schengen Area member states.

cuba.notes: Eligible to travel to Cuba with a tourist card only without visa if hold a valid visa or permanent residence permit issued by Canada, the United States or an EU member state.

cyprus.notes: Visa free for a maximum stay of 90 days within 180 days for valid visa holders or residents of the Schengen Area member states.

dominica.notes: Visa free for a maximum stay of 6 months for valid visa holders or residents of the Schengen Area member states, the United Kingdom, the United States and Canada.

dominican_republic.notes: Visa free for a maximum stay of 90 days for valid visa holders or residents of the Schengen Area member states, the United Kingdom, Ireland, the United States and Canada.

eritrea.notes: Pre-arranged visa can be picked up on arrival.

ethiopia.notes: Visa on arrival if having permanent residence status on list of countries eligible for visa on arrival or invitation letter.

gabon.notes: Electronic visa holders must arrive via Libreville International Airport.

gambia.notes: Visa not required if Passengers traveling as tourists on a charter flight.

georgia.notes: Visa free for a maximum stay of 90 days within 180 days for valid visa holders or residents of EU/EFTA, GCC, Australia, Canada, Israel, Japan, New Zealand, South Korea and the United States.

ghana.notes: Pre-arranged visa can be picked up on arrival.

guinea.notes: Pre-arranged visa can be picked up on arrival.

guyana.notes: Those travelling as tourists can obtain a visa on arrival for a maximum stay of 30 days provided holding a letter of invitation from sponsor or host.

iran.notes:
Visa on arrival at Mashhad (MHD) airport for a maximum stay of 30 days.
Visa not required if visiting Kish island.
May apply online if travelling to Mashhad airport or imam Khomeini airport .

israel.notes: Confirmation from Israeli government is required before a visa is issued.

jordan.notes:
Visa on arrival if having an official "Businessmen card" issued by Jordan or an official letter confirming the attendance to a conference or workshop.
Visa is not required only if holding residence permits issued by , A GCC Member States, Switzerland an EEA Member state, Australia, Canada , Japan, or a Permanent Resident Card (Form I-551) issued by the USA. The residence permit should be valid for a minimum of 6 months.
Visa on arrival if traveling for medical treatment for Female or Male older than 50 years and younger than 15 years.

kazakhstan.notes: Visitors arriving from a country without Kazakh representation and holding an invitation letter, can obtain a single entry visa on arrival for a max. stay of 1 month.

kuwait.notes: Passengers with a confirmation that a visa has been approved before departure can collect their original visa at immigration counter.

laos.notes: Visa on arrival if having invitation letter from Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

lebanon.notes:
Extendable for 2 months
Free at Beirut International Airport or any other entry port (no Israeli visa/seal, hold a phone number, Lebanese address, non-refundable return/circle ticket).

liberia.notes: Pre-arranged visa can be picked up on arrival.

macedonia.notes: Visa free for a maximum stay of 15 days for valid visa holders of the Schengen Area member states.

mauritania.notes:
Available at Nouakchott–Oumtounsy International Airport.
30 days and 90 days and 1 year visa are available.

mexico.notes: Visa free for a maximum stay of 180 days for valid visa holders or residents of the Schengen Area member states, the United Kingdom, the United States, Canada and Japan.

moldova.notes: Invitation letter holders may apply for a visa electronically.

mongolia.notes: Pre-arranged visa can be picked up on arrival.

montenegro.notes: Visa free for a maximum stay of 30 days for valid visa holders or residents of the Schengen Area member states, the United Kingdom, Ireland and the United States.

myanmar.notes: Passengers with a letter of approval issued by the Ministry of Hotels and Tourism can obtain a visa on arrival

nauru.notes: Pre-arranged visa can be picked up on arrival.

nicaragua.notes: Visa free for a maximum stay of 90 days for valid visa holders or residents of the Schengen Area member states, the United States and Canada.

niger.notes: Pre-arranged visa can be picked up on arrival

nigeria.notes: Holders of written e-Visa approval issued by Immigration Authority can obtain a visa on arrival, provided holding a visa application form and e-Visa application payment receipt and holding an invitation letter from Nigerian company accepting immigration responsibilities.

oman.notes: Passengers with a Visa Deposit Receipt can obtain a visa on arrival.

panama.notes: Visa free for a maximum stay of 30 days for valid visa holders or residents of Australia, the United Kingdom, the United States and Canada.

qatar.notes: Holder of valid residence permits or visas from either the United States of America, Canada, the United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, the Schengen countries, or the countries of the Gulf Cooperation Council can obtain an Electronic Travel Authorisation

romania.notes: Visa free for a maximum stay of 90 days within 180 days for valid visa holders or residents of the Schengen Area member states.

san_marino.notes: Same rules as for Italy. No border control but accessible only via Italy.

são_tomé_and_príncipe.notes: Holders of a visa issued by the United States or a Schengen area member state do not require a visa for stays up to 15 days.

senegal.notes: Visa not requiered for Passengers with an official invitation letter.

serbia.notes: Visa free for a maximum stay of 90 days within 180 days for valid visa holders or residents of the Schengen Area member states, the United Kingdom, Ireland and the United States.

sierra_leone.notes: Pre-arranged visa can be picked up on arrival

solomon_islands.notes: Pre-arranged visa can be picked up on arrival.

somalia.notes: Available at Bosaso, Galcaio and Mogadishu airports.

sudan.notes: Passengers with an "Entry Permit" issued by the Sudanese Ministry of Interior can obtain a visa on arrival.

tajikistan.notes: Pre-arranged visa can be picked up on arrival.

trinidad_and_tobago.notes: Pre-arranged visa can be picked up on arrival.

tunisia.notes: Visa not required for passengers traveling on an organized tour.

turkey.notes:
Turkey visa Issued free of charge for Iraqi national.
Holders of a valid visa or residence permit from Schengen area countries, Ireland, the United Kingdom or the United States can apply for e-visa.

uzbekistan.notes: Pre-arranged visa can be picked up on arrival.

vatican_city.notes: Schengen Visa Required. Entry can be made from Italy exclusively.

vietnam.notes:
Prearranged visa obtained online through travel agencies available at Hanoi, Ho Chi Minh City, Phu Quoc or Da Nang airports.
Phú Quốc - visa exemption for up to 30 days.
